meanings.definition: A person who devises or plans something.
meanings.sent1: The devisor of the new game had a brilliant idea for the rules.
meanings.sent2: The devisor of the project carefully thought out each step.
meanings.sent3: The devisor of the surprise party kept it a secret from everyone.
meanings.sent4: As the devisor of the escape plan, he was hailed as a hero.
meanings.sent5: The devisor of the strategy was praised for their creativity.

meanings.sent1: The devisor left his entire estate to charity in his will.
meanings.sent2: The devisor specified who would inherit his antique collection.
meanings.sent3: The devisor's will surprised everyone with its unusual requests.
meanings.sent4: She acted as the devisor, ensuring her family's future was secure.
meanings.sent5: The devisor's will reflected his generous nature.

meanings.definition: The creator or originator of something.
meanings.sent1: The devisor of the plan was hailed as a genius by all.
meanings.sent2: The devisor of the theory revolutionized the field of science.
meanings.sent3: The devisor of the recipe added a unique twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: As the devisor of the concept, she received widespread acclaim.
meanings.sent5: The devisor of the invention changed the world with their idea.
